required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic and Bioequivalence Study of Savolitinib Tablets in Healthy Chinese Male Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Crossover Pharmacokinetic and Bioequivalence Study of Savolitinib Tablets Produced by Two Different Processes in Healthy Chinese Male Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, randomized, open lebal, single-dose, three-period, crossover clinical study in healthy Chinese male subjects to assess the pharmacokinetics and bioequivalence/bioavailability of two formulation savolitinib tablets.

detailed_description.textblock: Thirty six Chinese male subjects who met the inclusion criteria but not met the exclusion criteria, will be hospitalized in Phase I Ward one day before first dosing and randomized into three groups, 12 subjects each, at a ratio of 1:1:1. The subjects in the different group will follow the fixed dosing regimen with 600 mg savolitinib tablets (200 mg/tablet x 3 tablets) after the standard meal on day 1 in cycle 1, 2 and 3 respectively: TRR, RTR or RRT, where "T" indicates dry granulation savolitinib tablet and "R" indicates wet granulation savolitinib tablet. PK blood samples, 2 mL each time, will be collected at the following time points in each dosing cycle: within 0.5 hours before dosing and 0.25, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 12, 24, 36, 48 hours after dosing(16 time-points).

primary_outcome.measure: The area under the curve(AUC) of savolitinib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day3, Cycle2 Day1 to Day3, Cycle3 Day1 to Day3, each cycle is 10 days.
primary_outcome.description: The area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) from 0 to the time of the last measurable concentration.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) of savolitinib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day3, Cycle2 Day1 to Day3, Cycle3 Day1 to Day3, each cycle is 10 days.
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed concentration, occurring at Tmax.

primary_outcome.measure: The time to Cmax (peak time, Tmax) of savolitinib
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day3, Cycle2 Day1 to Day3, Cycle3 Day1 to Day3, each cycle is 10 days.
primary_outcome.description: The time at which maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) is observed.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day3, Cycle2 Day1 to Day3, Cycle3 Day1 to Day3, each cycle is 10 days.
primary_outcome.description: The time required for the concentration of the drug to reach half of its original value.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day3, Cycle2 Day1 to Day3, Cycle3 Day1 to Day3, each cycle is 10 days.
primary_outcome.description: A term in pharmacokinetics used to assess the expected in vivo biological equivalence of two proprietary preparations of a drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: To observe the safety of healthy volunteers after a single oral dose of savolitinib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the first dose to within 12 days after the last dose
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse events evaluated by NCI CTCAE v4.03

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured on the Cycle1 Day1 to Day3, Cycle2 Day1 to Day3, Cycle3 Day1 to Day3, each cycle is 10 days.
secondary_outcome.description: The area under the curve (AUC) is the definite integral in a plot of drug concentration in blood plasma vs. time.

arm_group.description: The subjects in this arm will receive Test preparation (T). T is dry granulation savolitinib tablets.
The subjects in this arm will receive Reference preparation(R). R is wet granulation savolitinib tablets.

intervention.description: Test preparation (T): dry granulation savolitinib tablets.
Reference preparation (R): wet granulation savolitinib tablets.
